title: wine_Gramercy_2012_Syrah_(Columbia_Valley_(WA))

country: US.
description: This wine is a blend of four distinctive sitesâ€”Minick and Olsen in the Yakima Valley, and SJR and Stoney Vine in the Walla Walla Valley. It pulls together the best of all of them, with brooding notes of mineral, wet stone, earthy funk, coffee, smoked meat and black and green olive. The palate steals the show, with hypnotic savory flavors that coalesce around a vibrant, extended finish. It's a textural marvel that is simply impossible to put down..
